ModulePrefs.title: Quick Stock Watch
ModulePrefs.description: A simple Stock Quotes and Portfolio tracking module. Works for over 30 international markets - Argentina, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, Denmark, Egypt, France, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Israel, Italy, Japan, Jakarta, Korea, Malaysia, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Singapore, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Turkey, UK, United States and more.. You can watch the up/down ticks of your favorite stocks and monitor your portfolio at desired intervals (Data provided by Yahoo! Finance)
ModulePrefs.author: Uday Kumar Pyda - Sunnyvale, CA

<style type="text/css">
  a { color:#0000DD;}
  a:visited { color:#0000DD;}  
</style>
<script language="Javascript">
var bf="http://download.finance.yahoo.com/d?s=";

var symbol="^DJI,^GSPC,^IXIC";
var bB=bf+symbol+"&f=snl1c1p2";

_IG_FetchContent(bB,_IG_Callback(responseText),{refreshInterval:60});


function responseText(ds){
  var result=ds;
  try{
    var cS=new RegExp("\n");
    var quotes=new Array();
    quotes=result.split(cS);
    for(var c=0;c<quotes.length;c++){
      var symbol=aE(c);
      if(symbol==""){
        continue;
      }
      var bJ=quotes[c];
      alert(bJ);
    }
  }
}
